greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: For n > 1, a(n) doubles under the transform T, where Ta is the matrix product of partition triangle A008284 with a, with a(1) = 1.
formula: a(1) = 1 and a(n) = Sum_{i=1..n-1} A008284(n, i)*a(i) for n >= 2 (because 2*a(n) = Sum_{i=1..n} A008284(n,i)*a(i) for n >= 2).
program: lista(nn) = {my(a=vector(nn)); a[1]=1; for(n=2, nn, a[n] = sum(i=1, n-1, P(n,i)*a[i])); a;} \\ _Petros Hadjicostas_, May 30 2020
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 15 1999
ext: Various sections edited by _Petros Hadjicostas_, May 30 2020
